segments.text: Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would like to buy a Walkman . Can you tell me about the models you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we have a lot of models here.Did you want to listen to CD's or cassettes or the radio ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mostly cassette tapes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . There are several models you may want to look at.This Kreng portable cassette player is very good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Kreng ? I've never heard of that company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a German company.This unit has auto-reverse , recording capability , and an AM / FM radio band.It also has a built-in microphone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suppose I don't want that one then . I don't like auto-reverse . It breaks too easily .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Have you had an auto-reverse break before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , twice now . I think it's too high-tech , and so it's the first part that breaks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm . You know , the problem might be dust . Did you clean the unit often ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . No , I didn't clean it.But still , I only had the last one two months , and it broke . I don't trust auto-reverse .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . Well . We have many units without auto-reverse.Here is a good unit . Very reliable.It has an AM / FM band , built-in microphone , recording capability , and no auto-reverse .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This one sells for $ 39.99 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I test it out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds great . I'll take it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . I think you'll be happy with it . It's a very good unit . Very reliable . I'll go get you a new one in a box . I will be back in just a moment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks .
segments.speaker: S2
